text:
Kate Middleton and Prince William still don’t know the gender of the baby they’re expecting!

The couple are currently awaiting the arrival of baby number three with Kate‘s due date quickly approaching in April.

“William and Kate don’t know the sex of the baby so they’re rather looking forward to finding out. It’s very difficult to be totally prepared when you don’t know if it’s going to be a boy or a girl,” a source tells E! News.

They added, “Kate is now officially on maternity leave until the autumn and looking forward to welcoming the new baby.The whole family is excited, including the children, who are very much aware that they are about to welcome a new brother or sister.”

Kate recently made her final public appearance before her maternity leave.
title: Kate Middleton & Prince William Still Don't Know Baby Number 3's Gender!
